column1: Little Goat Diner////I was wary of the hype
column2: but this place was amazing. Went solo on a business trip and had a goat burger
column4: and took a turtle pie to go. Everything was amazing. The burger was delicious and cooked perfectly
column6: which I was told are cooked in Stephanie's saute sauce that they also sell in bottles
column7: were amazing though a little oniony for my taste. The turtle pie was a decadent entire small pie with the best cookie crust I've ever had
column8: and smothered in delicious caramel and cashews. (Definitely sharing size.) Amazing
column9: and can't wait to go back. Made an opentable res Â but there was no wait for one or two people to sit at the counter on a Sun night.
